remarks: The stabilizer subgroup in a group action.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gasta.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gasta.2 $e |- H = { u e. X | ( u .(+) A ) = A } $.
gastacl $p |- ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ A e. Y ) -> H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
$d .(+) u $.
$d A u $.
$d G u $.
$d X u $.
